richContent.title: How to Delete a patient from the schedule?
text: STEP:1. Click the Patient Schedule icon.
STEP:2. From the Schedule screen, select patients to be removed.
STEP:3. Click Delete Selected. ï‚· Alternatively, choose one of the following options.
ï‚· Click Delete All to remove all the patients from the list.
ï‚· Click Delete All Completed to remove all the completed patients marked with
STEP:4. Click OK to the confirmation prompt.
